## Current weather and climate data
- [https://isithotrightnow.com/](https://isithotrightnow.com/) Is it really that hot in Australia?
- [https://nsidc.org/sea-ice-today](https://nsidc.org/sea-ice-today) Daily Arctic and Antarctic sea ice data
- [https://climatereanalyzer.org/](https://climatereanalyzer.org/) Weather forecasts and climate charts
- [https://www.wetterzentrale.de/](https://www.wetterzentrale.de/) Weather forecast maps and diagrams
- [https://carbonmonitor.org/](https://carbonmonitor.org/) Daily CO2 emission estimates since 1 Jan. 2019
